basicInfo.name: Soi
basicInfo.flavor: Soi and her hawk are so in sync that she can even visualize what it sees. Her extraordinary bond with her hawk earned her the nickname Hawkeye.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 40% chance to inflict Bleed [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Heartpiercer
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 315% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Bleed [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 375% of Physical Attack.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 3 Turn(s)]

Skill 2.name: Hawk Attack
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies (By Highest No. of Buffs)
 - Deals damage equal to 120% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict 2 Buff Removal(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 145% of Physical Attack.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Adds Damage: Increases damage dealt by 15% each time the number of targets is reduced by 1.

Passive.name: Aerial Scouting
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Quintuple-Target Attack Resistance [Always Active]
 - Self
 - Grants Effect Hit Rate Boost. [Always Active]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Quintuple-Target Attack Resistance to 15%.
 - Increases Effect: Effect Hit Rate Boost to 40%.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Feng Yan, hawks, her dad, bow, horses, fields, dim sum, noodles, chivalry
profile.dislikes: Difficult books or philosophy, the Power of Destruction, picking on the weak
profile.story: Soi and her hawk are so in sync that she can even visualize what it sees. Her extraordinary bond with her hawk earned her the nickname Hawkeye.

basicInfo.name: Soi
basicInfo.flavor: In addition to mastering the art of hawking, Soi became a skilled archer, capable of hunting even without her hawk's assistance.

basicInfo.name: Soi
basicInfo.flavor: Soi learned the art of hawking by shadowing her father on his hunts and observing his techniques. Now, she is skilled enough to venture out on her own.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 35% chance to inflict Bleed [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

 - 85% chance to inflict Bleed [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 255% of Physical Attack.

 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict 1 Buff Removal(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 100% of Physical Attack.
